Title: SQL Database script generation for Visual Studio 2008
Description: This project host a Visual Studio Add-In for creating schema scripts, stored procedures and views from SQL Server.  Basically, with a couple of clicks you can generate all your tables, stored procedures, and views as individual scripts with DROP/Add statements for foreign keys, constraints, etc.  Sure makes life easy for creating build scripts, and working under source control. :)
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project host a Visual Studio Add-In for creating schema scripts, stored procedures and views from SQL Server. Basically, with a couple of clicks you can generate all your tables, stored procedures, and views as individual scripts with DROP/Add statements for foreign keys, constraints, etc. Sure makes life easy for creating build scripts, and working under source control. :)
